titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable the Lords spiritual and temporal, and to the Honourable the knights, citizens, and burgesses in this present Parliament assembled, the humble petition of Titvs Oates, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Oates, Titus, 1649-1705.
